languages.text: {n}Медицина бессильна сохранить жизнь в этом угасающем теле, но вам удается стабилизировать состояние человека. Изо рта мученика доносится слабый стон.{/n} "Зачем... зачем ты продлеваешь... мой цикл? Ты ждешь... покаяния? Разве не очистил я... свою душу... страданиями..." {n}Мученик заходится кашлем.{/n} "Или должно мне... покаяться за остальных..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Медицина бессильна сохранить жизнь в этом угасающем теле, но вам удается стабилизировать состояние человека. Изо рта мученика доносится слабый стон.{/n} "Зачем... зачем ты продлеваешь... мой цикл? Ты ждешь... покаяния? Разве не очистил я... свою душу... страданиями..." {n}Мученик заходится кашлем.{/n} "Или должно мне... покаяться за остальных..."

languages.text: {n}No treatment can preserve the life in this fading body, but for the moment, you are able to stabilise him. He groans weakly.{/n} "Why... why do you prolong... my cycle? Are you waiting... for my repentance? Have I not yet purged... my soul... through my torment..." {n}He breaks into a coughing fit.{/n} "Or must I... repent for the others..."

Are you waiting... for my repentance? Have I not yet purged... my soul... through my torment..." {n}He breaks into a coughing fit.{/n} "Or must I... repent for the others..."

languages.text: {n}没有任何治疗方法可以保住这个正在消逝的生命。但就目前而言，你成功地稳定住了他的情况。他虚弱地呻吟着。{/n}“为什么……为什么要延长……我的周期？你是在等待着……我的忏悔吗？难道我还没有……通过苦难……让我的灵魂得到净化吗……”{n}他猛地咳嗽起来。{/n}“还是说……我必须……为其他人忏悔……”
languages.original_text: {n}No treatment can preserve the life in this fading body, but for the moment, you are able to stabilise him. He groans weakly.{/n} "Why... why do you prolong... my cycle? Are you waiting... for my repentance? Have I not yet purged... my soul... through my torment..." {n}He breaks into a coughing fit.{/n} "Or must I... repent for the others..."

traits.locale_text: {n}没有任何治疗方法可以保住这个正在消逝的生命。但就目前而言，你成功地稳定住了他的情况。他虚弱地呻吟着。{/n}“为什么……为什么要延长……我的周期？你是在等待着……我的忏悔吗？难道我还没有……通过苦难……让我的灵魂得到净化吗……”{n}他猛地咳嗽起来。{/n}“还是说……我必须……为其他人忏悔……”

languages.text: {n}Ningún tratamiento puede preservar la vida que se escapa de su cuerpo, pero, por el momento, logras estabilizarlo. El hombre emite un quejido débil.{/n} «¿Por qué... por qué prolonga mi ciclo? ¿Está esperando... a que me arrepienta? ¿Acaso no he purgado ya... mi alma... a través del tormento...?». {n}El hombre rompe a toser.{/n} «O acaso debo... expiar a los demás también...».
languages.original_text: {n}No treatment can preserve the life in this fading body, but for the moment, you are able to stabilise him. He groans weakly.{/n} "Why... why do you prolong... my cycle? Are you waiting... for my repentance? Have I not yet purged... my soul... through my torment..." {n}He breaks into a coughing fit.{/n} "Or must I... repent for the others..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ningún tratamiento puede preservar la vida que se escapa de su cuerpo, pero, por el momento, logras estabilizarlo. El hombre emite un quejido débil.{/n} «¿Por qué... por qué prolonga mi ciclo? ¿Está esperando... a que me arrepienta? ¿Acaso no he purgado ya... mi alma... a través del tormento...?». {n}El hombre rompe a toser.{/n} «O acaso debo... expiar a los demás también...».

languages.text: {n}どんな治療を施しても弱りつつある男の命は救えないが、今だけでも心臓を安定させることはできる。男はか細くうめき声をあげた。{/n}「な…なぜ…サイクルの…延長を？まだ後悔が…足りない？まだ、苦しんで…魂を…清めろと、言うのか…」{n}男はゴホゴホと咳き込んだ。{/n}「それとも…他の者の、ために…懺悔を…」
languages.original_text: {n}No treatment can preserve the life in this fading body, but for the moment, you are able to stabilise him. He groans weakly.{/n} "Why... why do you prolong... my cycle? Are you waiting... for my repentance? Have I not yet purged... my soul... through my torment..." {n}He breaks into a coughing fit.{/n} "Or must I... repent for the others..."

traits.locale_text: {n}どんな治療を施しても弱りつつある男の命は救えないが、今だけでも心臓を安定させることはできる。男はか細くうめき声をあげた。{/n}「な…なぜ…サイクルの…延長を？まだ後悔が…足りない？まだ、苦しんで…魂を…清めろと、言うのか…」{n}男はゴホゴホと咳き込んだ。{/n}「それとも…他の者の、ために…懺悔を…」

languages.text: {n}Keine Behandlung kann das schwindende Leben dieses Körpers bewahren, aber es gelingt dir, ihn für den Moment zu stabilisieren. Er keucht schwach.{/n} "Warum ... warum verlängert Ihr ... meinen Zyklus? Wartet Ihr ... auf meine Reue? Habe ich meine Seele ... durch die Qual ... nicht genug gereinigt ...?" {n}Er bekommt einen Hustenanfall.{/n} "Oder muss ich ... für die anderen bereuen ...?"
languages.original_text: {n}No treatment can preserve the life in this fading body, but for the moment, you are able to stabilise him. He groans weakly.{/n} "Why... why do you prolong... my cycle? Are you waiting... for my repentance? Have I not yet purged... my soul... through my torment..." {n}He breaks into a coughing fit.{/n} "Or must I... repent for the others..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Keine Behandlung kann das schwindende Leben dieses Körpers bewahren, aber es gelingt dir, ihn für den Moment zu stabilisieren. Er keucht schwach.{/n} "Warum ... warum verlängert Ihr ... meinen Zyklus? Wartet Ihr ... auf meine Reue? Habe ich meine Seele ... durch die Qual ... nicht genug gereinigt ...?" {n}Er bekommt einen Hustenanfall.{/n} "Oder muss ich ... für die anderen bereuen ...?"

languages.text: {n}Aucun traitement ne pourra empêcher la vie de quitter ce corps à l'agonie, mais vous parvenez à le stabiliser temporairement. Il gémit faiblement.{/n} « Pourquoi... pourquoi prolongez-vous... mon cycle ? Attendez-vous... ma repentance . Mes souffrances... n'ont-elles pas encore... lavé mon âme... {n}demande-t-il avant d'être pris d'une quinte de toux.{/n} Ou dois-je aussi... me repentir pour les autres... »
languages.original_text: {n}No treatment can preserve the life in this fading body, but for the moment, you are able to stabilise him. He groans weakly.{/n} "Why... why do you prolong... my cycle? Are you waiting... for my repentance? Have I not yet purged... my soul... through my torment..." {n}He breaks into a coughing fit.{/n} "Or must I... repent for the others..."

Il gémit faiblement.{/n} « Pourquoi... pourquoi prolongez-vous... mon cycle ? Attendez-vous... ma repentance . Mes souffrances... n'ont-elles pas encore... lavé mon âme... {n}demande-t-il avant d'être pris d'une quinte de toux.{/n} Ou dois-je aussi... me repentir pour les autres... »

languages.text: {n}Hiçbir tedavi bu soluk bedendeki canı kurtaramaz. Yine de onu bir süreliğine stabilize edebiliyorsun. Zayıfça inliyor.{/n} "Neden... Neden döngümü uzatıyorsun?.. Tövbe mi edeyim?.. Azabımla... Arınmadı mı ruhum?.." {n}Öksürük krizine giriyor.{/n} "Yoksa... Diğerleri için mi tövbe etmeliyim?.."
languages.original_text: {n}No treatment can preserve the life in this fading body, but for the moment, you are able to stabilise him. He groans weakly.{/n} "Why... why do you prolong... my cycle? Are you waiting... for my repentance? Have I not yet purged... my soul... through my torment..." {n}He breaks into a coughing fit.{/n} "Or must I... repent for the others..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiçbir tedavi bu soluk bedendeki yaşamı koruyamaz ama onu bir süreliğine stabilize edebiliyorsun. Zayıfça inliyor.{/n} "Neden... Neden uzatıyorsun döngümü?.. Tövbe mi edeyim?.. Azabımla... Arınmadı mı ruhum?.." {n}Öksürük krizine giriyor.{/n} "Yoksa... Diğerleri için mi tövbe etmeliyim?.."
